title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Court Ruling on iPhone (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Court Ruling on iPhone (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Robert Mintz, a partner at McCarter and English, discusses a recent court ruling, affecting the ability orf law enforcement to compel someone to use a fingerprint to unlock their phone. He speaks with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
